About Me

BIO

Hello! I'm Kris, a software engineer based in Vancouver, BC.

My passion is building awesome UI / UX, websites, web apps & games.

I graduated from Vancouver Film School in 2018. While there I worked with a team of designers and artists to ship a multiplayer video game, Super Neon Colosseum. After graduating I have been mastering the art of web technology.
